document.full_text: a grand jury has indicted three texas men for illegally buying guns for others, including one used in the shooting death of a u.s. immigration agent in mexico, the justice department said on thursday.
document.title: u.s. indicts three over gun tied to mexico shooting
lines_and_colors: a grand jury has indicted three texas men for illegally buying guns for others, including one used in the shooting death of a u.s. immigration agent in mexico, the justice department said on thursday.
